reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress sexy and flattering, with one mentioning it can be styled for both formal and casual occasions. The dress is comfortable and effective at hiding the belly, and one customer notes it's suitable for a range of ages. The fit receives mixed feedback - while some find it perfect, others say it's not made for curvy girls. The fabric quality is also mixed, with some describing it as thick and soft while others find it cheap. The high slit is a concern for many customers. items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Flattering and COMFORTABLE
items.body: So, so comfortable. I'm someone who loves extra big t's or birthday suit. This is the next best thing except I look like I'm ready for a night out, instead of a bum, while being extremely comfortable. For me, this a little short for a dress but it's represented accurately in the picture. I'm not that bold anymore so I wore it with pants. The fabric is thin, but not see through, stretchy, soft and breathable. I've slept in this thing a few times also. I need more in other colors! Want to mention that the shape of it is perfect for hiding a little extra tummy. Very flattering so if you wear this to a buffet you won't have to suck it in. This dress is gonna have you looking cute and going to hide all that while accentuating curves In the right areas Read more
items.author: Alexandra Sharp

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars The perfect LBD!!
items.body: This dress was a hit!! Iâ€™m 5â€™5 and 190 lbs. I purchased a size XL and it fit perfectly. The dress is classy but still very sexy. The split was the perfect touch! I loved the fit and the look!! No complaints from me! Read more
items.author: Shayna

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Heck yeah!ðŸ‘
items.body: Hides tummy a bit Very sexy Wore it for Vampire costume Read more
items.author: With my Hard Earned $

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Elegant and Sexy
items.body: This dress looks amazing on. The slit is very high so depending on your body you might need to wear undies with lace or a cute black boy-short panty with lace on the bottom because it can give folks a peep of the goods. Otherwise it's both elegant and sexy. The material is thin but it drapes nicely on the body. Wish it came in more colors because it's the perfect vacation evening dress! I'm 5'5" 135lbs and a medium was the right size. Read more
items.author: elise mullem

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Flimsy mess for the priceâ€”shouldâ€™ve been a $10 tee, not a dress.
items.body: I tried the Floerns Womenâ€™s Deep V Neck Twisted Plunging dress, andâ€¦eh. It looked sexy on the photos, but IRL? It felt like a thin costume youâ€™d pick up for laughs. What tanked it: Material felt cheapâ€”thin, flimsy polyester with zero substance; several reviewers said it â€œfelt thin and not worth the priceâ€ or even smelled funny Poor constructionâ€”loose stitching, uneven seams; really not what you expect when it retails for significantly more. Price vs quality mismatchâ€”this thing shouldâ€™ve been around $10, max. Spending more just feels like a rip-off considering how it wears . What could have worked (if it wasnâ€™t terrible): The cut is flattering if it actually held shapeâ€”a deep V and twist front could highlight curves nicely. Lots of stretch (95 % polyester, 5 % elastane) Couldâ€™ve made it comfyâ€¦if not for the total junk feeling. Bottom line: Sorry, Floerns, but this was a big nope. The vibeâ€™s thereâ€”a flirty silhouette with a sexy slitâ€”but itâ€™s all ruined by cheap fabric and sloppy sewing. Not worth more than $10 in the bargain bin. I returned mineâ€”it deserved a better homeâ€¦or no home at all. Read more
items.author: K2DaMFP

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice Dress
items.body: I love this dress. I read the reviews to try to figure out what size because I wear different sizes in different brands. I am about 207lbs 5'8 and 38DD and bought the xxlarge. It fits great and hides my stomach. The slit is high but I can pin it if I want to. The length isn't too bad either. Read more
items.author: Sharyn Hill

items.title: 2.0 out of 5 stars Little too short!
items.body: Cute dress, but a touch too short. If it was an inch shorter, it wouldâ€™ve been all good. Read more
items.author: EVAN P.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Womenâ€™s Cocktail Dress
items.body: Love this black dress. This dress is true to size. I ordered a size medium and it fits so well. Love the stretchiness. Itâ€™s a very flattering dress. Read more
items.author: Angie Jones

short_description:
Womens Dress V Neck is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.
about_this_item:

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

long_description:
Womens Dress V Neck is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Light Blue, A Black Pure, Pink, Burgundy. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
